page.title: 06A DAY IN THE LIFE OF SHEETAL
page.content: { } I USUALLY SPEND SUNDAY MORNINGS BATHING AND DRYING MY HAIR.THEN I GO DOWN AND HELP MY MUM IN THE KITCHEN. IN THE AFTERNOON I GET READY TO GO TO THE TEMPLE.WE GO THERE EVERY SUNDAY AND SOMETIMES ON A WEEKDAY IF THERE IS A SPECIAL OCCASION.AT THE TEMPLE WE FIRST LISTEN TO SOMEONE WHO READS OUR BIBLE AND THEN PRAY.THEN AT 6.30 WE DO A THING CALLED AN ARTI WHEN WE PRAY AND PUT SOME FOOD BY OUR GOD'S PHOTO SO THAT HE CAN EAT. FOR THE LAST TWO WEEKS I HAVE BEEN GOING TO THE TEMPLE AT 3.00 TO LEARN INDIAN DANCING. THE TEMPLE FINISHES AT 8.30 WHICH IS WHEN WE COME HOME TO HAVE SOMETHING TO EAT. THEN I WATCH T.V. FOR A WHILE. AT ABOUT 9.45 I GO UPSTAIRS,CLEAN MY TEETH AND AM IN BED BY 10.00PM.
